Allocation Parameters

 

  • Allocation Parameters
    • Filters
    • Editing a Parameter
      • Field Description

 The allocation parameters screen displays all configurations of all components with those parameters. This screen allows the user to view all parameters belonging to the particular component or across all the components. The user is able to sort the filter by name, description, and component.  

The intended user for this  UI is an admin, manager, and others.

 

Filters
  • Name
  • Description
  • Component

Editing a Parameter

Navigate to Menu > Configurations > Allocation Parameters

 

Swipe Out List

  1. Select the required parameter record. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  2. In the Edit wizard, modify the parameter values.
  3. Click the Submit button to update the modified values.
           Note: The Admin has permission to modify the allocation parameters.
Field Description

The following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

Field

 

Description

 
Name The parameter name.
Description The description of the parameters.
Component The name of the component where this configuration is present.
